alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued October 20 at 3:57PM MDT until October 24 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Significant snow possible for mid October. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, with the higher amounts in the higher-elevation valleys such as Park City. * WHERE...Wasatch Back, particularly the Park City area. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through late Sunday night, with the heaviest snow expected Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Snow may result in periods of travel difficulties overnight, especially for untreated roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
